text: Where would you store the refresh tokens? The one downside of serverless is that there is no writeable db or storage. Seems like a purpose built key/value store would be really useful.

Question for the HubSpot team... Any plans to add CORS header capabilities, I was kind of stunned that you can only call serverless functions from within the origin FQDN and resulted in us making a bunch of workarounds. Seems like it would benefit HubSpot and make serverless functions stickier.
